text.0:
We’ve seen many claims online about gangs of child abductors.

Child abduction is a serious crime, but some of these claims are not legitimate and there is little evidence of a rise in attempted abductions.

https://t.co/7kB9AXLeZ8
text.1: "A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is still getting its boots on. What may start in the US often ends up on our shores" -- @FullFact's Tom Phillips on the fact checking challenges of the US election @flashboy @theipaper @ipaperviews https://t.co/gVaAczwWqG
text.2:
Misuse of Statistics: Time to speak out.

Great leadership from the International Association for Official Statistics.

Their online event is next Tuesday. Book here: https://t.co/2nw1DrDaDd
text.3:
We're piloting a WhatsApp fact checking service.

If you get sent something that you're not sure of, you can forward it on to the Full Fact phone number and our team of independent, impartial fact checkers can look into it for you.

https://t.co/7GLGesKFzR
